      • setup

        public static void setup()
        This method puts all the items into the specified rooms.
        Since:
        1.0

      • dead

        public static void dead()
                 throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method runs forever to check if the player has died.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Because the thread sleeps every three seconds.
        Since:
        1.0

      • item_exists

        public static boolean item_exists​(java.lang.String item)
        This method checks to see if an item exists in the game.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to check.
        Returns:
        True is the item exists, otherwise false.
        Since:
        1.0

      • list

        public static java.lang.String list​(java.lang.String thing)
        This method lists items in a room or the users inventory
        Parameters:
        thing - The room name or inventory
        Returns:
        String of items
        Since:
        1.0

      • itemInRoom

        public static boolean itemInRoom​(java.lang.String list,
                                 java.lang.String item)
        This method checks if an item is in a specific room.
        Parameters:
        list - The String of room items.
        item - The item to check.
        Returns:
        True if the item is in the indicated room otherwise false.
        Since:
        1.0

      • addItem

                           java.lang.String item)

        item - The item to add.
        Since:
        1.0

      • itemActions

        public static void itemActions​(java.lang.String action,
                               java.lang.String item)
                        throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method handles all the actions that a user can make in the game. These actions are pickup, drop, and use.
        Parameters:
        action - The action to take.
        item - The item to do actions on.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Because the thread sleeps for three seconds.
        Since:
        1.0
